sentences.sContent: They were at the mercy of informers who might at any moment denounce them.
sentences.sCn: 他们完全受那些随时可能告发他们的告密者的支配。

synos.tran: 谴责；告发；公然抨击；通告废除

remMethod.val: de + nounce(讲， 说) → 打小报告 → 告发

trans.tranOther: If you denounce someone who has broken a rule or law, you report them to the authorities
